meanings.definition: The act of buying and selling animal hides.
meanings.sent1: In the market, the fellmongerings were bustling with activity as traders haggled over prices.
meanings.sent2: The fellmongerings in town were known for their fair deals and high-quality products.
meanings.sent3: The fellmongerings decided to have a hide-and-seek competition to add some fun to their business.
meanings.sent4: Her negotiation skills were so sharp, she could turn any fellmongerings deal into a win-win situation.
meanings.sent5: The smell of the fellmongerings area was so strong, it lingered in your clothes for days.

meanings.definition: The business or trade of processing animal skins.
meanings.sent1: The fellmongerings industry was booming, with many factories opening to meet the demand.
meanings.sent2: She inherited the family fellmongerings business and worked hard to expand it.
meanings.sent3: The fellmongerings competition turned into a skin-deep rivalry between the two companies.
meanings.sent4: His dedication to the fellmongerings trade was as tough as leather, never wavering in tough times.
meanings.sent5: The machinery in the fellmongerings workshop hummed with efficiency, turning raw hides into valuable products.

meanings.definition: The practice of removing hair or wool from animal hides.
meanings.sent1: The fellmongerings process required skilled hands to carefully strip the hides of any unwanted materials.
meanings.sent2: After the fellmongerings were done, the hides were soft and ready for further processing.
meanings.sent3: The fellmongerings team decided to have a shearing contest to see who was the fastest.
meanings.sent4: Her precision in the fellmongerings work was like a surgeon's, leaving no trace of hair behind.
meanings.sent5: The sound of the fellmongerings tools scraping against the hides echoed through the workshop.
